content: mini donuts cat toy crochet pattern created by melissa trenado this mini donut measures about 2 inches across and 1 inch tall when completed you will need size d hook 3 25mm yarn for donut color a yarn for frosting color b very small amount of yarn to make sprinkles stuffing cat nip optional yarn needle donut with yarn color a chain 14 round 1~ join with a single_crochet in the first chain made making sure your chain isn t twisted this will create a circle for the center of your donut single_crochet in the remaining 13 chs 14 single_crochet round 2~ single_crochet in next st 2 single_crochet in the next / repeat around 21 single_crochet round 3~ single_crochet in each of the next 2 sts 2 single_crochet in the next/ repeat around 28 single_crochet rounds 4-6~ single_crochet around 28 single_crochet round 7~ single_crochet in each of the next 2 sts decrease/ repeat around 21 single_crochet round 8~ single_crochet in the next st decrease/ repeat arounf 14 single_crochet fasten_off leaving a long tail for sewing stuff the inside of the donut lightly add catnip if desired too much stuffing will make it harder for you to sew the donut close with your tail sew the inside of the donut close icing with yarn color b chain 14 round 1~ join with a single_crochet in the first chain made making sure your chain isn t twisted this will create a circle for the center of your donut single_crochet in the remaining 13 chs 14 single_crochet round 2~ single_crochet in next st 2 single_crochet in the next / repeat around 21 single_crochet round 3~ single_crochet in each of the next 2 sts 2 single_crochet in the next/ repeat around 28 single_crochet round 4~ 3 double_crochet in the next st single_crochet sl single_crochet/ repeat around fasten_off leaving a long tail for sewing sew icing onto the top of the donut with different colors i used 3 add sprinkles randomly on top of icing using your sewing needle i hope you enjoyed this crochet pattern if i have made any errors or if you have any questions feel free to contact me at any time lionqueenmelissa@gmail com ravelry ~ lionqueenmelissa
